'''''Gymnopilus aurantiophyllus''''' is a species of [[mushroom]] in the family [[Cortinariaceae]].

==Description==
The [[pileus (mycology)|cap]] is {{convert|4|to|8|cm|in|1|abbr=on}} in diameter.<ref name="Hesler 1969"/>

==Habitat and distribution==
''Gymnopilus aurantiophyllus'' has been found growing in clumps on sawdust, in [[Oregon]], in November.<ref name="Hesler 1969"/>

==See also==
[[List of Gymnopilus species|List of ''Gymnopilus'' species]]
